hyperparameters.name: max_depth
hyperparameters.short_desc: The max tree depth, which means no constraint on max_depth.

hyperparameters.name: min_samples_leaf
hyperparameters.short_desc: The minimum number of samples required to be at a leaf node.

hyperparameters.name: learning_rate
hyperparameters.short_desc: The learning rate of each tree.

hyperparameters.name: max_iter
hyperparameters.short_desc: The max number of iterations, each iteration is a splitting step.
